attributes.action: Fund ways to prevent Asteroid and Comet impacts with the Earth
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This threat is real.  It should be tackled now.  We have the technology to stop comet and asteroid impacts on Earth but governements will not give money to projects that will detect and deflect hazedous space debris.
More money is spent on war than on protecting our planet.
I ask that money be spent to prevent catastophic impacts by asteroids and comets.
